post_title: FS: T206 Cobb Bat Off and EPDG Chance Red
post_content: I have for sale a Cobb Bat Off SGC 2.5 and a EPDG Chance SGC 1.5. Both cards look the part. Asking $7000/BO on the Cobb and $1700/BO on the Chance. PM for fastest response. Pictures are not the greatest, have to buy a new scanner. If you need a closer shot just let me know.
